title: Ys 1 & 2 Complete [ENG, Latest Patches, Optional Files Incl]
description:
Ys 1 & 2 Complete
by Falcom
English Translation by Nightwolf

This is not an ISO rip because Falcom decided to bunk each of the two DVDs with a 3GB file that serve no purpose other than to take up space.  I have included installation instructions for setting the games up quickly and easily.

My main reason for including the translation packs and the alternate soundtracks are because the page that they were originally hosted on seems to be down.

The patches for the game are included to, just leave them in the same dir as the English patch installers and they will install when you patch the game (the patches will also add the necessary registry information to your system to make it think it was installed normally)

Read the "READ THIS FIRST-How To Install.txt" file to get it set up

Alternate soundtracks are included in the "Optional" folder.

Enjoy my first torrent contribution ever!

-Reiver
